text:
[Verse]
Flying high we touch the sky
Paper planes we let them fly
Lonely fields and clear blue sky
Chasing dreams that never die

[Verse 2]
Caught a breeze let's drift away
Simple times on a sunny day
Fold the paper watch it soar
Through the open bedroom door

[Chorus]
Paper planes in the air
Floating gentle with no care
For a moment we're so free
Paper dreams a memory

[Verse 3]
Whispers in the summer air
Take my hand we'll go somewhere
In the wind our hopes will ride
Together we'll be side by side

[Bridge]
Simple folds and gentle touch
Tiny wings that mean so much
Launch these dreams into the blue
I'm the pilot next to you

[Chorus]
Paper planes in the air
Floating gentle with no care
For a moment we're so free
Paper dreams a memory
title: Paper Planes
